mapper.insert: insert into bankcardinfo ( serialid, custno, bankno, bankacco, certtype, certno, state, province, city, subbank, createtime, updatetime ) values( #{serialid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankacco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select:
select b.serialid, b.custno, b.bankno, b.bankacco, b.certtype, b.certno, b.state, b.province, b.city, b.subbank, date_format(b.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as createtime, c.banknm, c.level from bankcardinfo b,bankbase c where b.bankno=c.bankno and
b.custno = #{custno,jdbctype=varchar} and
b.serialid = #{serialid,jdbctype=varchar} and
b.state='Y'
mapper.update: update bankcardinfo set state = 'N',UPDATETIME=sysdate() where custno = #{custno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state = 'Y'
mapper.delete: delete from bankcardinfo where serialid=#{serialid,jdbccType=VARCHAR} and state = 'Y'
